row.process:
! insert these lines in your script to determine if an error occurred
!PRINT DEBUG &KISS_STE_ENTITE# ! ! ! Verification existance dans referentiel :PSET &OUTIL_DNS#=GET_VAR(VARA.REFERENTIEL.DNS, &KISS_SITE_ENTITE#) !:PSET &OUTIL_BACKUP#=GET_VAR(VARA.REFERENTIEL.BACKUP, &KISS_STE_ENTITE#) !:PSET &OUTIL_VCENTER#=GET_VAR(VARA.REFERENTIEL.VCENTER, &KISS_STE_ENTITE#) !PRINT AAAAAAAA &OUTIL_DNS# BB &OUTIL_BACKUP# CC &OUTIL_BACKUP# ! :IF &OUTIL_DNS# = " " : PRINT KO: OUTIL_DNS VIDE : PSET &EXIT_KISS_KO#="&EXIT_KISS_KO#,OUTIL_DNS:VIDE" : MODIFY_STATE STATUS_TEXT="OUTIL_DNS:VIDE" SET RC=10 :ELSE : PRINT OK:OUTIL_DNS &OUTIL_DNS# : PSET &EXIT_KISS_OK#="&EXIT_KISS_OK#,OUTIL_DNS:&OUTIL_DNS#" :ENDIF
!:IF &OUTIL_BACKUP# = " " !: PRINT KO: OUTIL_BACKUP VIDE !: PSET &EXIT_KISS_KO#="&EXIT_KISS_KO#,OUTIL_BACKUP:VIDE" ! SET RC=10 !:ELSE !: PRINT OK:OUTIL_BACKUP &OUTIL_BACKUP# !: PSET &EXIT_KISS_OK#="&EXIT_KISS_OK#,#OUTIL_BACKUP:&OUTIL_BACKUP#" !:ENDIF ! !:IF &OUTIL_VCENTER# = " " !: PRINT KO: OUTIL_VCENTER VIDE !: PSET &EXIT_KISS_KO#="&EXIT_KISS_KO#,OUTIL_VCENTER:VIDE" ! SET RC=10 !:ELSE !: PRINT OK:OUTIL_BACKUP &OUTIL_BACKUP# !: PSET &EXIT_KISS_OK#="&EXIT_KISS_OK#,#OUTIL_VCENTER:&OUTIL_VCENTER#" !:ENDIF ! !:IF &KISS_TEMPLATE# <= " " !: PRINT KO: TEMPLATE VIDE !: PSET &EXIT_KISS_KO#="&EXIT_KISS_KO#,TEMPLATE:VIDE" ! SET RC=10 !:ENDIF ! !:IF &KISS_HOSTNAME# <= " " !: PRINT KO: HOSTNAME VIDE !: PSET &EXIT_KISS_KO#="&EXIT_KISS_KO#,HOSTNAME:VIDE" ! SET RC=10 !:ENDIF SET ERRORLEVEL=%RC% @set retcode=%errorlevel% @if NOT %ERRORLEVEL% == 0 goto :retcode
